archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Dispatch Task
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: This process dispatches technicians and/or third parties to perform manual activities.

properties.value: The Dispatch Task scope includes the following: â€¢{T}Dispatching assigned tasks to the appropriate performer (e.g. a single technician or a crew) from the companyâ€™s workforce or from a third-party workforce to perform manual activities â€¢{T}Managing the dispatching process via various channels â€¢{T}Monitoring various dispatch states â€¢{T}Managing the delivery of reassignments and changes to all affected performers â€¢{T}Managing notification profiles and rules â€¢{T}Managing settings required for proper task dispatching
